venue.address_2: between Anthony's Pier 4 & World Trade Ctr
venue.name: Atlantic Beer Garden

item.description:
Launch your weekend with friends at the roomy Atlantic Beer Garden with water views of Boston's Seaport area. Cocktails and appetizers (not planning sit-down dinner). Easy validated parking at 25 Northern Ave or on street as available. Or, Silver Line to Court House Station.

Looking for at least 4 people to hold the event. Meet inside the entrance area until 6:15 then look for us in the lounge. Hope to see you there!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Friday Afterhours
